storyInfo:
Ptilopsis is writing in her diary. She always uses the diary as a way to record things she doesn't want to forget.
Except now, she would prefer to directly chat with those who she cares about.

attributes.content: Ptilopsis, you're back.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Thanks for going on that site inspection for me. I'm almost done with this experiment, so I'll be able to do the next one myself.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It's okay.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: I can go next time too.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Did something happen?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Yes. I'm going to my room now.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: ...Okay.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I think it should be in this diary...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: No, this one was written at Rhine Lab. So, it should be this one...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Yes, this one. This diary is from after I came to Rhodes Island with Silence.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Let me see.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: March 21 \ Overcast
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Today, two new operators came to the Island. One named Hung and one named Aak. They seem to be from the same place as Waai Fu.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: It is significant that Aak, who looks very young, is said to be a very famous back-alley doctor in Lungmen. But it seems he will not join the medical section.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: April 2 \ Cloudy
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Ever since he found out that Warfarin is 'Mr. Blood,' he has been visiting the medical section regularly.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: But most of the medical section does not like him. This is because he does nothing to conceal his disrespect for us as his peers.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: He is clearly highly skilled at healing Arts. Why...?
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: April 15 \ Sunny
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: ...Speaking of Aak, Hung came to take him away after his latest competition with Warfarin. He has since curbed his behavior somewhat.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: And the medical team is growing accustomed to his personality——at least outwardly.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: This diary must be from the time of his second 'duel' with Warfarin.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Hey, 'Mr. Blood,' how about a little contest of skill?
attributes.name: Aak

attributes.content: Wow, what an obnoxious little wretch you are. Didn't you realize the power differential at work the last time you lost to me?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Are you serious? You think I lost that?
attributes.name: Aak

attributes.content: Hey, Miss Feathers, you were there too. Who won that?
attributes.name: Aak

attributes.content: Silence, he means you.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: I'm Miss Feathers?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Analysis determines a 50% chance he is calling me. However, my logic functions have determined I do not want to respond to this form of address.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Neither do I.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: What are you whispering about? Come on, I didn't lose the last one, did I?
attributes.name: Aak

attributes.content: ...Aak, we're busy. Please don't interrupt our work.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Sure, sure. I'm just asking a question. Give me an answer and I'll leave you to your noble 'work.'
attributes.name: Aak

attributes.content: Very well. Accessing system records...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: According to the records, it is true that, objectively speaking, the winner of the last contest was difficult to determine, due to the unexpected circumstances arising at the end.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Well, how about that!
attributes.name: Aak

attributes.content: Pfft, fine. Let's give you a loss to remember today!
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: *Sigh*. It's been like this every day since that Aak showed up. I really don't understand why the Doctor would hire someone like that...
attributes.name: Chatty Medic Operator

attributes.content: Despite his abrasive personality, there is no denying that his clinical expertise, as well as his natural talent, is impressive.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: I know what you mean. But I think he looks down on us.
attributes.name: Chatty Medic Operator

attributes.content: Yeah, yeah, that last surgery really impressed a lot of people, and I was kind of sold on him myself. I figured I'd try to make friends. He ended up treating me like garbage.
attributes.name: Lively Medic Operator

attributes.content: I hate that guy!
attributes.name: Lively Medic Operator

attributes.content: Only big boss Warfarin could get along with him.
attributes.name: Gossipy Medic Operator

attributes.content: Is that what getting along looks like...? What do you think, Ptilopsis?
attributes.name: Chilly Medic Operator

attributes.content: Searching dictionary database.... Result: birds of a feather flock together.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Hahaha, that works on a couple levels!
attributes.name: Lively Medic Operator

attributes.content: What's going on in here? Looks like you're having a good time.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Ah, Dr. Ansel, we were talking about Aak.
attributes.name: Gossipy Medic Operator

attributes.content: Oh.... I don't connect well with his personality, but it's nice to have a fresh face as skilled as him.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Leave it to Dr. Ansel to have nice things to say about Aak....
attributes.name: Lively Medic Operator

attributes.content: All right, even if we didn't have work to do, you can't be chatting it up during work hours. Back to your stations.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Right——
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: You have something, Ansel?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Well, I have the report. The results aren't exactly stellar.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: That's more or less what we expected, though. Let's start preparing the next experiment right away.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Ptilopsis, you go too.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Zzzzzzz.... Oh? Yes, understood.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Aak joining the medical section was a major upset to the order of things. And while there was some unpleasantness, I somehow did not dislike it...
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Oh, I wrote, 'I did not dislike it' in this one.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: If I recall correctly, there should be more....
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Right, here it is.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: June 10 \ Light rain
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: The reconnaissance operators appear to have discovered a vein of Originium ore in a nearby mountain range, and Dr. Kal'tsit has sent a team to investigate.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: To be safe, Silence and a few medic operators went along.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Nothing else to do today but wait for test results.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: May 15 \ Sunny
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Gavial came back from an operation and told us at dinner that she grew so annoyed with the enemy scurrying around that she personally waded into battle and cut them all down.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: She seems to have forgotten that she is a medic operator. But she did make it sound appealing.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: May 1 \ Cloudy
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Today, after interviewing a new medic operator, I talked with Ansel about what we were doing before coming to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: I couldn't reveal much of the inner workings of Rhine Lab to him due to confidentiality agreements, but it was a meaningful conversation.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Yes, this is it.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: In other words, you were also half patient and half researcher at Rhine Lab?
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Yes, Silence has had me on a customized course of treatment from then until now.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: And Silence herself is Infected, and she has her own course.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Such things are not uncommon at Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: So Rhine Lab does a few things just like Rhodes Island. I always thought of Rhine Lab as a technology company.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Well, it's not a proactive approach to outreach like Rhodes Island's. I can't say more.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: But it is safe to assume that Rhine Lab cooperates with Rhodes Island in this area due to a shared outlook.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Indeed.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Then I guess it's my turn.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Hmmm.... There's not much to say. My hometown is in Rim Billiton, and since my family was poor, I never had much access to technology, or really anything new.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: After bouncing around a bit, I stumbled on a job listing for Rhodes Island. I put in a resume just to see what would happen, and here I am.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: It blew me away when I first got here. I never thought I'd ever get to work in a place like this.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Indeed. I did not think of Rhodes Island as a small land cruiser when Silence first discussed the cooperation agreement.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: But I've certainly learned a lot since coming here, and the remuneration is pretty good.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: It's a bit of a shame I can't get home to see my family more often though.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Family....
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Um, did I say something I shouldn't have?
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: No. I'm just recalling my family from the database.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Load successful. So that's them. I had forgotten.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: ...It's hard, not seeing your family.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: It isn't.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Huh? It's not?
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: It's not.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Never mind. Please, continue with your story, Ansel.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Oh, um, okay, I guess I can tell you about Rim Billiton.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Ansel spoke a lot about his homeland: the look of the mining town, his family, his sister, why he chose to become a doctor, and other such things.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: I don't know why, but it felt a bit distant to me, like a memory of what my parents looked like...
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Yes, everyone in the medical section talks about themselves on a regular basis. I am familiar with everyone's past. But for me, it is always a very distant thing.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Until then, I had thought it a very normal feeling.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: However, this is a problem that does exist.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Now then, it's time to write today's entry. It may be longer than usual this time.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: MM DD \ Overcast
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: I finally returned to Rhodes Island after a rather long trip.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Although I occasionally travel with small teams, this time there were some additional circumstances that caused some difficulties.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Yes. Difficulties.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Zzzzz....
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: ........Excuse me, Ptilopsis?
.......! Was I sleeping?
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Yes, I just need to tell you that we ran into a bit of a situation with the extraction and we need to recalibrate our tools.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Do you need my help?
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: No, thanks. You've been a great help so far, Ptilopsis. It's a purely manual recalibration. No need to bother you.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: The captain just wanted you to know that the calibration may not be done today. If you're bored, there's a Kazimierz village not far from here, you could go for a stroll.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: It's the only mobile village in the area. It's not that small, and the scouts say there's a fair on today that might have some fun things.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Of course, if you want to keep resting here, that's fine too.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: ...Yes. I want to see it.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Sure. Here's a map, and some petty cash for you.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Sorry, we didn't really plan for this situation, so that's all the Kazimierz coinage we have.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Kazimierz... coinage?
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Ah, well, while most places accept Lungmen dollars, they're not universal. Especially these villages outside of nomadic cities. They usually only take local currency.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: ...Yes, that sounds correct. There is some corroborating information in the database.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: All right, let's get going.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Oh. Are you going too?
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Well, yes. This is a small operation, so we didn't establish a base camp, the main point being we can't use our communications equipment.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: That means, when somebody without combat capability wants to head out, she'll need an escort.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Not to mention, we all know your physical condition. You definitely can't be allowed out alone, for your own safety.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: This is the first time I have encountered this base camp information. Database update required.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Oh, you didn't know that?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: No, I rarely go out.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Oh, err, right. I shouldn't have brought it up, sorry...
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Why are you apologizing?
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Nothing. Never mind. Let's move out.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: In retrospect, he apologized to me because he felt he hadn't properly considered my health and had said something that could have hurt me.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: In fact, I didn't think of that at all at the time.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: And....
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Here, I encountered my first problem——It seems I do not know many things that others take for granted.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: No, it's not that I don't know, exactly. These things are in my database, but I have forgotten them because I haven't used them for so long.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Yes. I should adjust the wording.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Then, my second problem.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Kazimierz's scenery is quite different from Columbia's, or the view from the bridge of Rhodes Island. The air is clean, and vegetation plentiful.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Most of the villagers were Kuranta, but there were some of other races as well.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: The village fair was much busier than I expected.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: After a meeting with a logistics operator in charge of procurement, he showed me around and asked if I would like to buy anything.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: I thought perhaps I could bring gifts for everyone in the medical section.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: What can I get you, Miss?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Hello, Miss?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: ...I don't know.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Huh? You want to buy something but you don't know what it is?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Ah, sorry, my companion is easily distracted.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: We want some local Kazimierz's goods.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: At that point, I realized my second problem. I do not know what everyone in the medical section enjoys.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: That isn't to say we don't have a good relationship. On the contrary, Dr. Silence and I should be good friends, according to the broad definition of the term.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: We've worked together extensively since our time at Rhine Lab, and she's the one who invited me to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: My relationships with the rest of the medic operators are amicable as well.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: But I don't know what they like.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: I never thought about it.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: After that, we headed back to camp, and the rest of the expedition proceeded without incident.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: But on the way back, I began to think about something I had never realized was wrong.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Well.... Of course, I actually slept about half the trip.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: On the way to the village, I even fell asleep in the middle of the road.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: But to make for an easier read, I will omit those details.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Since joining Rhine Lab and transferring to Rhodes Island...?
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Ptilopsis, open up!
Ifrit, what are you doing here?
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Silence is busy in the lab. I heard you were back so I came to see you.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: It's like, since you're pretty much always here, it was a lot weirder to have you gone. I'm used to Silence being out.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I'm so glad you're back!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Indeed, I rarely go out.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: ...Indeed, I rarely go out.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Why'd you say that twice, Ptilopsis?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: It just occurred to me that I don't actually go outside very often.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Huh? Did you hit your head out there?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: No, it was just some unknown error in the system. It has been fixed.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: I bought some Kazimierz goods. They're over there.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Really! Let's see....
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Wow, this is a cool wooden sword.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hya! Whew! Shwing!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Check it out. Don't I look like one of those flippy Kurantas?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Eh.... Whatever. I still want it!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: There is a storybook on the shelf. You can read it over there. I'm going to write something.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Sweet!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Phew.... Now then.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: It's been a long time since I joined Rhine Lab and moved to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: I'm completely used to the way things are now and subconsciously consider it normal.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: But this trip made me realize that's not the case.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Not that I reject the life I lead. I have just suddenly become aware of this problem.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: That is, I am myself quite far from normal.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Is 'normal' the correct word here? Is it my life that is abnormal?
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: ...Broadly speaking, I suppose it is.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: And I simply forget.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Even I have a hard time describing what Oripathy has taken from me and given to me.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: I can manage that once Silence worked out a treatment plan for me at Rhine Lab, research and sleep gradually took over my entire life.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: My body doesn't allow me to do time-consuming work, let alone leave the facility.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: I am self-conscious about my condition, so even on the rare occasions that I do go outside, I do not move about so freely.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: For as long as I can remember, all my knowledge of the outside world has come almost entirely from the descriptions of my colleagues, various documents, and the unchanging view outside my window.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Now that I think about it, it's only natural that I would aspire to be like Gavial and Ansel.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: But before today, I did not realize why.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Because I can't help but compartmentalize myself when people discuss their lives.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: I can engage with their topics, but I subconsciously think I don't belong in them.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Ptilopsis, what are you writing? Doesn't look like a report to me.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: A diary.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: A diary? Oh, Silence told me to keep one, but it was a huge pain!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: True, it is a lot of work to write every day, but it is necessary for me.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: To keep myself from forgetting.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Why do you forget?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Because I am forgetful.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Um.... Don't get it.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: It is better if you don't.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Oh.... Can I see it?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You can. But it is all text. I don't think you will like it.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Yeah, screw it. I'll go back to my storybook.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Now then, where was I...?
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Silence, what's the matter? Something wrong in the lab?
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Huh? Ah, no.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm just trying to figure out what to get Ifrit for her birthday. It's coming up.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: A birthday present?
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Yes. It needs to be fireproof, and it needs to be something she likes. Ugh, a child's mind is so unpredictable.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I should just make something myself.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Nothing. I was just pondering how even Silence thinks about such things.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Is it that strange? Well... maybe it's a bit unlike me.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But since I decided to take Ifrit with me, these things are my responsibility.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Even Silence, who can bury herself in her work for days on end, has such a side to her.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: I understand that this is my own problem.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Or should I say, it was not a problem to begin with.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: I don't feel so bad, because I do not dislike this researcher's life.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: On the other hand, if I hated research, I wouldn't have joined Rhine Lab at all.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Whether at Rhine Lab or Rhodes Island, I have seen countless people more miserable than I. And I'm lucky compared to them.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: And I believe that the research I'm doing is something meaningful.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: So, I'm not writing this as a lamentation, or to say that I've suddenly realized that I've been living the wrong kind of life.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: I just remembered the purpose of my diary.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: I hear strange noises from time to time, metal scraping, crashing, shouting, explosions.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: It's like these voices are coming from deep inside me, haunting me.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Sometimes when I wake up, I find myself in a sort of trance and I forget where I am and what I'm doing.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Of course, I don't really forget, but there's no denying that I'll need more time and energy to remember than a normal person would.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: I started this diary just to ensure I did not forget something important.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Something important....
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Ptilopsis, why are you staring at me? And what have you been mumbling to yourself all this time?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Nothing.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Did you get yourself into trouble? Do you need me to talk to Silence for you?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I'll help you once, 'cause we're friends. You better not have done anything too bad. I don't need a spanking from Silence.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hehe, don't worry.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Today's encounter made me realize something.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: When it comes to the important things, just trying not to forget them isn't enough.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: Rather, I wish I could do more to understand the people I care about.
attributes.name: Diary

attributes.content: I don't want to regret anything.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Ptilopsis, is Ifrit with you?
Hey, it's Silence!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ifrit didn't give you any trouble, did she?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: No, she was very good.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Hehehe.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I'm glad. And are you okay? You seemed a bit off when you came back today.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm fine.... But, yes, I was just about to go looking for you.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: For me?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Yes, I'd like to talk to you.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Talk? Don't we always talk?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'd like to... discuss a few things I've never thought about before.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis
